message.body: Hey Meg, How are you? I just remembered that Comedy Dreamz is tomorrow at 9 at The Barbary. Are you going? They have a really spectacular lineup.
Yeah, I was planning on going, I am going to the beach during the day, so it really depends on how that goes
I hope your day goes well then.
Yeah! I hope to do both
Did you make it to the show?
No, I got sunburned, and have school in the am..are you going?
I'm here. There's beer. Deal with it!
I'm sorry you burned your epidermis.
Maybe next show. Or karate at the Abbaye .
Was it phun?
The show was phucking phantastic. If you had been there, that might have been more phun than I could've handled.
Next time, for reals...I'm bummed I missed it but I had to be at school at seven thirty, too early to be phun
Lame. Who can learn at 7:30am? I had a chemistry class at that time in 9th grade. I did terribly. Def not PHUN.
HI Meg! How are you?
Hey mark, I'm good, how are u?
Not too bad. How is school? What classes are you taking?
School is good, super busy. Is a comedy dreamz coming up?
There was a comedy dreamz at the end of August. I think they're usually every other month. So the next is probably at the end of October.
Oh ok, I will try to come out some time before that if possible. Ha
Have you gone to Karaoke at the Abbaye lately?
And yes. Lets play sometime soonley.
Comedy Dreamz this Tuezday.
I know! I'm going this time. And you should have said tuezday
Sweet!
I'm at Barcade now, stop by if you are coming down early.
Hi Meg, are you still planning to come to Comedy Dreamz tonight?
Yes, no faking! What time are you going?
I guess 9-ish?
Cool I will def be there
You better. Or I'll come looking for you. And when I find you, I'm gonna give you a good spanking.
Kind of weird...but I will be there!
I don't know how much longer I can save this seat for you.
Are you close?
It was good to see you last night, Meg! Wish I had more energy to dance the night away with you.
It was good to see you too! I was really into dancing, wish it would have been more of an imperative for everyone haha
I like to dance, you just caught me on a night when I was old.
I hate those nights, they are the worst!
Meg, you should come to Woody's this evening for the Revolution House Reunion concert.
